LevelNotValidException - Exception in model.levelsequence.level
The exception thrown when a level is not correct and thus cannot be validated.

LevelNotValidException.MultipleInitialPointException - Exception in model.levelsequence.level
The exception meaning that more than one initial position were found.
LevelNotValidException.NoInitialPointException - Exception in model.levelsequence.level
The exception meaning no initial position was found.
LevelNotValidException.NoTargetException - Exception in model.levelsequence.level
The Exception meaning no target was found.
LevelNotValidException.UncorrectPositionException - Exception in model.levelsequence.level
The exception meaning that one or more positions are not in the grid.
LevelNotValidException.UnequalBoxAndTargetNumberException - Exception in model.levelsequence.level
The Exception meaning boxes and targets are not in equal number.

An editable, ordered and iterable sequence of levels, with a name.
